title: enna kAraNamO
sahitya:
enna kAraNamO enniDam nI innum irangAmal iruppadum murugA


anupallavi

  panmurai aDiyEn shonnamurai kETTum aNNalE nIyum dayai paNNAmal iruppadum


caraNam    aDiyAraik-kAttiDum kaDamai viTTanaiyO koDiyEn enrE kai koDAmal viTTanaiyO
aLLi aLLiyE koDai aLittiDa kaLaippAlE vaLLalE nI ayarndu urangiTTanaiyO
